en: When an enemy dies it releases 4 homing flies from its corpse dealing {1} ({3}) damage
zh: 当敌人死亡时，会从其尸体上释放出4只归巢苍蝇，造成 {1} ({3}) 点伤害

en: Spawns a companion that flies around you and shoots enemies for {0} ({1}) damage
zh: 生成一个同伴，在你周围飞行并射击敌人，造成 {0} （{1}) 的伤害

en: When an enemy dies it releases 2 homing flies from its corpse dealing {1} ({3}) damage
zh: 当敌人死亡时，会从其尸体上释放出2只归巢苍蝇，造成 {1} ({3}) 点伤害

en: Can start with any Extatonion weapon
zh: 可以从任何 Extatonion 武器开始
